plan.name: Basic Base
plan.description: Start selling your products online with a secure, beautiful store with unlimited products

plan.name: Standard Base
plan.description: Great for growing businesses with more team members and large transactions

plan.name: Pro Base
plan.description: Level up with the enterprise base for high-volume sellers

plan.name: ShopBase Fulfillment Service Only
plan.description: If you only want to fulfill your Dropship or Print-on-Demand orders (without using ShopBase Storefront), you can use ShopBase Fulfillment Service with absolutely no subscription fees. We deliver high-quality & competitive-price products, guarantee shipping time to ensure your customer's happiness. Please be aware that your store will not be able to accept new orders when you switch to this free plan. Do you agree?
